column4: ppl, how can i know some program's dependencies ???? e.g. : "depends" on win32 ...
ppl, how can i know some program's dependencies ???? e.g. : "depends" on win32 ...
ppl, how can i know some program's dependencies ???? e.g. : "depends" on win32 ...
If you're using dpkg or something similar, it won't install without satisfying dependencies and will let you know what you need.
